DOC.brief_summary: The objective study show post-prandial benefit Palaeolithic-type meal compare meal construct along line WHO dietary recommendation .
DOC.detailed_description: The effect set meal assess respect blood - blood glucose - plasma insulin - satiety score - plasma gut hormones It hypothesise low post prandial blood glucose concentration , low insulin response increase satiety see Palaeolithic meal compare reference meal
DOC.criteria: male ≥ 18 ≤ 60 year old Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 18 ≤ 27.0 kg/m2 Apparently healthy Not smoke A fasting blood glucose value within normal reference value No prescribe medication
